name: Paris Bistro Home-style Potato Soup

ingredients.name: medium potatoes
ingredients.additionalInstruction: peeled and cut into large pieces

preparation: In a Multipurpose Pot, bring Bouillon and potatoes to a boil over high heat. Reduce temperature and simmer for 15 minutes until potatoes are tender.
Using a potato masher, break potatoes into smaller pieces. Soup should still be 'lumpy'.
Stir in hot milk and French Onion Dip Mix. Season to taste with Salt and Pepper.
Gently reheat until hot. To prevent curdling, do not boil. Pour into bowls and top each with a dollop of Paris Bistro Sauce.

products.name: French Onion Dip Mix
summary: Ruffled chips and crunchy veggies don’t stand a chance when French Onion is on the table! Gluten and sodium free, and packed with all the delicious taste of toasted onion and parsley, this blend makes a kid-friendly dip, but it doesn’t stop there. Use it to season any savoury dish where you’d like to liven up the flavour with onion — without having to chop or roast a bunch of onions!
